iati-activity.title: Liberia Road Maintenance EU
iati-activity.description: The purpose is to contribute towards improving maintenance of roads by building the capacities and preparedness of the Liberia Ministry of Public Works. This will benefit over 33.3% of the population and resolve transportation challenges. This will improve transportation infrastructure on the entire coast of the Liberian section of the coastal corridor between Sierra Leone and Cote dâ€™ Ivoire.

iati-activity.related-activity: Working through the European Union to build the capacity and preparedness of the Ministry of Public Works to Liberia in road maintenance and infrastructure development.

iati-activity.title: Kenya Essential Education Programme
iati-activity.description: To increase access and improve the quality of education of 300,000 children in primary schools within the arid lands and urban slums, contributing to 70,000 more children in school, a 3% improvement in learning achievements in the early grades and a 10% reduction in teacher absenteeism by 2015. Activities will contribute to the MDGs of universal primary education and gender equity through improvements in the accessibility, affordability and quality of education for Kenyan children.
